pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-6164: Null JSON node throws error in double metaphone match
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

commit.message: DHFPROD-6164: Null JSON node throws error in double metaphone match

nodes.bodyText: One style note - I think comments like this often are better expressed as assertion messages, since if the assertion does fail, the test report shows the very helpful message. No need to change, just a note.
